name: Francisco Rodríguez
role: Data Scientist | Machine Learning Specialist | Data Visualization Expert
intro: I am a data scientist passionate about transforming complex datasets into actionable insights. My expertise spans data exploration, advanced analytics, machine learning, and data visualization to support strategic decision-making.
about_me_description: Proactive and collaborative, I thrive in team environments where continuous learning and innovation are key. I enjoy taking the initiative and contributing new ideas to achieve shared goals.
hobbies: Beyond work, I’m an active member of a percussion group. I also enjoy fitness, dancing, and spending quality time with my dog.
